translations: 极热的，酷热的；热烈的，激情迸发的
发咝咝声（sizzle 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I awake to the smell of sizzling bacon in the galley.
sentences.translation: 我醒来时闻到厨房里咝咝作响的熏肉的味道。

sentences.sentence: I can recommend the sizzling beef.
The Republican ballot features the most sizzling fights.
sentences.translation: 共和党的投票是最为激烈的争斗。
